HostList.Name: MCR
HostList.Description: Required to access images in Microsoft Container Registry (MCR). This registry contains first-party images/charts (for example, coreDNS, etc.). These images are required for the correct creation and functioning of the cluster, including scale and upgrade operations.

HostList.Name: Management
HostList.Description: Required for MCR storage backed by the Azure content delivery network (CDN).

HostList.Name: Login
HostList.Description: Required for Kubernetes operations against the Azure API.

HostList.Name: Packages
HostList.Description: This address is the Microsoft packages repository used for cached apt-get operations. Example packages include Moby, PowerShell, and Azure CLI.

HostList.Name: Acs
HostList.Description: This address is for the repository required to download and install required binaries like kubenet and Azure CNI.

HostList.Name: Data
HostList.Description: Required for MCR storage backed by the Azure content delivery network (CDN).
